text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hold it right theeeere―! You're just
barely in time for the start of school!
Being tardy is the predecessor to
delinquency! Do take care!

text_block_list.name: Classmate
text_block_list.text:
Jeeez. You can't be in a huff like that
every day, you know! Look, Prez, your
skin is rough.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Eh!? Rough skin!?!? 
Th, that can't be…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Neglecting one's health is the
predecessor to delinquency! At
this rate, am I going to become a
delinquent…!?

text_block_list.name: Classmate
text_block_list.text:
Seriously? Then, that makes me perfect, 
don't you think! 
I always take great care of my skin♪

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
What's this!? So, that means that, 
the delinquent… is……me!?

text_block_list.name: Classmate
text_block_list.text:
Uuumm… I don't totally get what you're
saying, but I'm sure it's fine! Don't
worry about it!

Sakura Bakushin O went through a crisis 
due to her rough skin…
